Turning indoor cycling into a party.
Don't stop won't stop the beat.

"BOULDER'S BEST CARDIO"

BOOK A BIKE
 

About Beat Cycle

We take you on a high-energy 45-minute ride taught by inspiration-inducing BEAT CYCLE instructors armed with music mixes that keep people moving and legs and hearts pumping.

Come get your sweat on with us, to the beat, on a high octane, calorie burning, obsession-producing journey that will leave you wrung out, exhilarated, and looking forward to your next ride!

What is Beat Cycle?

Meet Our Instructors

The Team

We're Hiring


Instructor auditions are being held on a rolling basis. If you're interested in becoming a Beat Cycle Instructor, send us your resume and a sample playlist at info@beatcycle.com.


Contact Us
Featured Instructor

Lucy J.
Instructor
Lucy is a Boulder girl who spent weekends at whatever ski mountain she could get a lift to. When the ski boots become too uncomfortable and her toes too cold she can't wait to slip her feet into some cycling shoes.

Tell us a secret: It took me three tries to pass the driving test (good thing I cycle!)
Favorite Dessert: Coffee ice cream with rainbow sprinkles
When I'm not no a bike I'm: Trail running
What I'm listening to: beats 1
